name: Moong Dal Chilla
instructions: Blend moong dal with water to make a smooth batter.
Add chopped onions, green chili, turmeric, and cumin.
Heat a non-stick pan, spread batter like a pancake, and cook both sides with little ghee.
Serve with mint chutney or curd.

name: Oats & Dry Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend oats, banana, nuts, and seeds with milk.
Pour into a glass and drink fresh!

name: Poha with Peanuts & Veggies
instructions: Heat oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves & onions.
Add peanuts, carrots, and poha. Cook for 2-3 minutes.
Squeeze lemon juice on top & serve hot!

name: Ragi Dosa
instructions: Mix ragi flour, rice flour, curd, salt, and water to make a smooth batter.
Let it rest for 5 min.
Heat a tawa, spread the batter thin like dosa, cook both sides.
Serve with coconut chutney.

name: Greek Yogurt with Nuts & Fruits
ingredients: ½ cup Greek yogurt (or hung curd)
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Enjoy a refreshing, protein-rich breakfast!

name: Besan Chilla
instructions: Mix besan, turmeric, water, and salt to make a smooth batter.
Add chopped onions & green chili.
Heat a pan, pour the batter & cook both sides with little ghee.
Serve hot with mint chutney.

name: Sprouts Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Toss well & serve fresh.

name: Vegetable Upma
instructions: Roast semolina in a dry pan & set aside.
Heat oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves & onions.
Add carrots, water & salt. Mix well.
Slowly add roasted semolina while stirring.
Cook for 2 min & serve hot.

name: Dalia (Broken Wheat Porridge)
instructions: Cook dalia in water/milk until soft.
Add jaggery/honey & cinnamon.
Top with bananas & nuts before serving.
